actions.text: Committee on Environment and Public Works ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Environment and Public Works. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Chafee. With written report No. 98-89.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under Regular Orders. Calendar No. 144.
Indefinitely postponed by Senate by Unanimous Consent.

official_title: An original bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to authorize funds for fiscal year 1984.

summary.text: Amends the Solid Waste Disposal Act to authorize appropriations for FY 1984 for: (1) general administration (including Resource Recovery and Conservation Panels, hazardous waste management, and support for State, regional, local, and interstate agency solid waste plans); and (2) assistance to State hazardous waste programs.

titles.title: An original bill to amend the Solid Waste Disposal Act to authorize funds for fiscal year 1984.
